circumstances: While in cruising altitude on a ferry flight from Flagstaff to Silver City, the pilot lost control of the airplane that entered a dive and crashed in flames near Show Low. The aircraft was totally destroyed and the pilot, sole occupant, was killed.
probable_cause:
Loss of control in flight and uncontrolled descent after the pilot suffered physical impairment. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Alcoholic impairment of efficiency and judgment, 
- Misjudged altitude, 
- Peak gusts 15 knots, 
- The pilot suffered a heart attack at an undetermined time, 
- Alcohol content 2,6‰.
